text: Futhi amaJuda namaKhrestu athi, “thina singamadodana (singabantwana) baMvelinqangi futhi siyizithandwa zakhe” ithi, “ngakho-ke kungani enijezisa ngenxa yezono zenu na”? Okunalokho nina ningabantu phakathi kwalabo (uMvelinqangi) abadalayo uthethelela lowo amthandayo futhi ujezisa lowo amthandayo futhi ungokaMvelinqangi umbuso wamazulu nomhlaba nokho konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili futhi sikuye isiphetho
